set vars & funcs
func:
//temperature advanced settings
flow.set("temperatureSettings",
    [
        {
            wakeOn: true,
            wakeSetpoint: 68,
            wakeTime: new Date(0),
            sleepOn: false,
            sleepSetpoint: 62,
            sleepTime: new Date(0),
            leaveOn: false,
            leaveSetpoint: 60,
        },
        {
            wakeOn: false,
            wakeSetpoint: 78,
            wakeTime: new Date(0),
            sleepOn: false,
            sleepSetpoint: 80,
            sleepTime: new Date(0),
            leaveOn: false,
            leaveSetpoint: 82,
        }
    ]
) // index 0 is heating, index 1 is cooling
